line.comment: * $target can be a sector, an object or a position array, in which case it must include the sector in index [3].
* SWM3 optional Rebel Outpost jump network and Player Hyperlane sector restriction
* First check if there's a beacon in target's sector.

sval.val: $target can be a sector, an object or a position array, in which case it must include the sector in index [3].
SWM3 optional Rebel Outpost jump network and Player Hyperlane sector restriction
First check if there's a beacon in target's sector.
